review: It depends on your situation whether the fire stick is right for you.I have come to view this fire stick as basically a wireless hdmi cable. I say this because all the firestick will do for you is stream stuff like huluplus, netflix, amazon prime movies/shows, etc. However, you have to pay individually for all those programs.Overall, if you want to save money, then your computer with an hdmi cable can do everything on your tv and more compared to the fire stick. But, if you find it a hassle to connect your hdmi cable into your computer and tv everytime then the Fire stick is an elegant solution.For me its useful because I have a small tv for gaming, and a projector. I use my computer and connect it to my projector in my living room, but now with firestick I can move the projector into my bedroom and just plug in my fire stick and stream all my movies/shows. Before, I would have to lug my computer around and it's a gaming computer weighing almost 20lbs. I have a laptop but it won't play large file movies that are 1080p, or at least it won't play them smoothly, which is why the fire stick is an adept replacement for my computers in this one situation. Is it worth the money? For me I really only use it in this one situation, in my bedroom, so I consider coming out even (since it was only $40). If you stream movies/shows a lot and don't have a computer near your tv then I would consider this worth it.
